title: Effects of Tuning Decision Trees in Random Forest Regression on Predicting Porosity of a Hydrocarbon Reservoir. Case Study: Volve Oil Field, North Sea
content:

Kushan Sandunil, Ziad Bennour, Hisham Ben Mahmud, Ausama Giwelli
Machine learning (ML) has emerged as a powerful tool in petroleum engineering for predicting reservoir properties such as porosity. Random forest regression (RFR) is one such widely used ML technique....
